data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the county of Palencia.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Palencia, Castilla y León, Spain
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Palencia, Castilla y León, Spain to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the county of Palencia against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Palencia.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Jew, Spanish-speaking people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Jew, Spanish-speaking people.
Father, guide the church in Palencia, Castilla y León, Spain to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the county of Palencia prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 2,775 believers in Palencia, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.
